title: Video games
bio: Video games has given me a lot of joy over the years, it was a means to socilize, relax, think, appreciate art and I even got into map and 3d design

title: Walking
bio: Montreal is walkable and the population is not too big, I wanted something to get me out of the house but that did not require any planning. I wanted to appreciate something simple that was not a distraction to get my brain in a relaxed state.

title: Cooking
bio: I like simple hobbies I can improve on, that I can do when I want and that adds to my life. Getting better at cooking is great for ones health, wallet and mind

title: Paining
bio: Something again that I can do by myslef, painting. I like the ability to do it when I want. This also helped a lot for design, creating a color pallet and a plan for conitnuity.

title: Drawing
bio: Taking a step back from painting and making it even more simple, I got into drawing. Now all I need is a pen and paper. Perhaps with a goal to create my own little story.

title: Reading
bio: 2018 I decided to make my new years resolution to read and I read every day since then. It helps a lot with learning too and being okay being bored. I also appreciate how there is a beggining middle and end rather then a loop like scolling on a phone.

title: Learning something new
bio: I always have a feeling I must learn something and ideally have synergy with my previous skillsets. Now I am focusing on things that help with coding and design with personal projects
